short_summary: Temporary Help Services against supply arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR)
description: This requirement is for Temporary Help Services against supply arrangement for the National Capital Region (NCR)
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement
**Solicitation Number:** S4663155
**Contract Title:** (Temporary Help Services - One Special Advisor)
**Published Date:** October 24, 2023
**Closes On:** October 30, 2023 at 15:00:00
---------------

### Tender Overview

The Department of National Defense (DND) is inviting tenders under the existing Supply Arrangement EN578-172870 for Temporary Help Services. The specific requirement is for One (1) Special Advisor.

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal against a Supply Arrangement
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
**Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

### Key Details
*   **Vendor Eligibility:** Only supply arrangement holders under the specified supply arrangement number who qualify under Stream 13.9 Special Advisor are eligible to participate.
*   **Security Level Required:** Secret

### Contact Information

For any inquiries or additional information, please contact:

*   CFSG(O-G) Temp Help
*   Email: [CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca](mailto:CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca)
*   Phone: (613) 971-7955

### Submission Details

*   Tender documents: Available at [canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca)
*   Attachment: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22950/s4663155--rfp-%28english-version.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22950/s4663155--rfp-%28english-version.pdf)
*   (French Version) [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22950/s4663155--dp-%28french-version.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22950/s4663155--dp-%28french-version.pdf)
